ingredients: 1 (10 pound) fully-cooked, bone-in ham, 4 cups boiling water, or as needed, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons dry mustard powder,   +   1/4 cup honey, 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, or as needed, 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained, 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained,   toothpicks
nutrition: Total Fat 33g 42%, Saturated Fat 12g 60%, Cholesterol 218mg 73%, Sodium 146mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 66g, Vitamin C 3mg 17%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 3mg 15%, Potassium 920mg 20%
